Room.Name: Goblin Secret Passage
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a small, well concealed passage in the underground shrine.
Room.LongDescription: You have heard stories of goblin treasure rooms down here, but of course you cna't believe everything you hear. And another thing - the stuff that goblins think of as treasure is often pure junk. Of course, now that you are here, you probably ought to find out for yourself.
